segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment for unique identification of the Advice on pending works number and type of document.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to give prior references of the whole document, for example, project number or contract number, and authorization references if required.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the dates that apply, e.g. forecasted date to start works, duration of the project and/or forecasted date of end of the works.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying names, addresses and contacts relevant to the advice.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses and their function relevant for the whole advice on pending works. In the construction industry parties involved are e.g. the contractor, the designer, the client.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments giving contact details of the specific person or department within the party identified in the NAD segment.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment giving additional contact information relating to the party specified in the NAD segment, e.g. contact name, department or function.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of the previous information given in CTA (phone, fax, telex, etc.).

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment, which enables the sender to specify in some occurrences the location(s) of the project.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify the nature of the works, in coded and/or clear form.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to specify which other documents (drawing organization, circulation list, plans, etc.) are to be sent and processed in conjunction with CONAPW, and what is the communication channel used to transfer them.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment enabling controls, for example, the number of documents attached to CONAPW.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment to provide an authentication of the message.
